plot: Two boys, whose parents ply their trade by the mouth of a muddy river in Osaka, become close friends. The two families' &"businesses&" are in fact dining and prostitution. When Nobou, the restauranteur's son, loses his pocket money during the Tenjin Festival, Kiichi, the prostitute's boy, invites him home, and he learns the truth.   Written by  L.H. Wong
title: Doro no kawa
plot_es: Two boys, whose parents ply their trade by the mouth of a muddy river in Osaka, become close friends. The two families' &"businesses&" are in fact dining and prostitution. cast.role: Shoko Matsumoto, Kiichi and Ginko's mother
cast.name: Mariko Kaga
